item.title: TrueSkill, Technical Report
item.description: The first skill estimator was developed by Arpad Elo, adopted by the World Chess Federations around 1970. TrueSkill is just the bayesian multiplayer version of Elo model, published by Microsoft in 2007. In this technical report I derive, step by step, the analytical solution of the model.

As a Social Anthropologist, I am currently finishing a PhD in Computer Science, developing the Computational Social Science area in one of the main scientific centers of the southern hemisphere. With several colleagues, we are working hard to lay the foundations of an interdisciplinary social sciences research center in Latin America. I just hope that our work will serve the historical project that reveres life over profitability.
